user.name: root
user.ObjectGrants: SELECT,INSERT,UPDATE,DELETE,CREATE,DROP,RELOAD,SHUTDOWN,PROCESS,FILE,REFERENCES,INDEX,ALTER,SHOW DATABASES,SUPER,CREATE TEMPORARY TABLES,LOCK TABLES,EXECUTE,REPLICATION SLAVE,REPLICATION CLIENT,CREATE VIEW,SHOW VIEW,CREATE ROUTINE,ALTER ROUTINE,CREATE USER,EVENT,TRIGGER,CREATE TABLESPACE,CREATE ROLE,DROP ROLE! APPLICATION_PASSWORD_ADMIN,AUDIT_ADMIN,BACKUP_ADMIN,BINLOG_ADMIN,BINLOG_ENCRYPTION_ADMIN,CLONE_ADMIN,CONNECTION_ADMIN,ENCRYPTION_KEY_ADMIN,GROUP_REPLICATION_ADMIN,INNODB_REDO_LOG_ARCHIVE,PERSIST_RO_VARIABLES_ADMIN,REPLICATION_APPLIER,REPLICATION_SLAVE_ADMIN,RESOURCE_GROUP_ADMIN,RESOURCE_GROUP_USER,ROLE_ADMIN,SERVICE_CONNECTION_ADMIN,SESSION_VARIABLES_ADMIN,SET_USER_ID,SYSTEM_USER,SYSTEM_VARIABLES_ADMIN,TABLE_ENCRYPTION_ADMIN,XA_RECOVER_ADMIN!

column.name: target
column.Comment: 是否开启浏览器新窗口

column.name: spec_key
column.Comment: 商品规格key 对应t_spec_goods_price 表

column.name: prom_type
column.Comment: 0 普通订单,1 限时抢购, 2 团购 , 3 促销优惠

column.name: service_rank
column.Comment: 商家服务态度评价等级

column.name: type
column.Comment: 发放类型 0面额模板1 按用户发放 2 注册 3 邀请 4 线下发放

column.name: type
column.Comment: 发放类型 1 按订单发放 2 注册 3 邀请 4 按用户发放

column.name: note
column.Comment: 管理员添加的备注信息

column.name: goods_type
column.Comment: 商品所属类型id，取值表goods_type的cat_id

column.name: spec_type
column.Comment: 商品规格类型，取值表goods_type的cat_id

column.name: exchange_integral
column.Comment: 积分兑换：0不参与积分兑换，积分和现金的兑换比例见后台配置

column.name: prom_type
column.Comment: 0 普通订单,1 限时抢购, 2 团购 , 3 促销优惠

column.name: attr_index
column.Comment: 0不需要检索 1关键字检索 2范围检索

column.name: attr_type
column.Comment: 0唯一属性 1单选属性 2复选属性

column.name: attr_input_type
column.Comment: 0 手工录入 1从列表中选择 2多行文本框

column.name: mobile_name
column.Comment: 手机端显示的商品分类名

column.name: consult_type
column.Comment: 1 商品咨询 2 支付咨询 3 配送 4 售后

column.name: parent_id
column.Comment: 父id 用于管理员回复

column.name: recommended
column.Comment: 是否推荐 0.未推荐 1.已推荐

column.name: is_distribut
column.Comment: 是否已分成0未分成1已分成

column.name: action_user
column.Comment: 操作人 0 为管理员操作

column.name: prom_type
column.Comment: 0 普通订单,1 限时抢购, 2 团购 , 3 促销优惠

column.name: is_send
column.Comment: 0未发货，1已发货，2已换货，3已退货

column.name: type
column.Comment: 插件类型 payment支付 login 登陆 shipping物流

column.name: scene
column.Comment: 使用场景 0 PC+手机 1 手机 2 PC

column.name: status
column.Comment: 0未付款,1已付款, 2等待分成(已收货) 3已分成, 4已取消

column.name: confirm_time
column.Comment: 确定分成或者取消时间

column.name: remark
column.Comment: 如果是取消, 有取消备注

column.name: pay_status
column.Comment: 充值状态0:待支付 1:充值成功 2:交易关闭

column.name: level
column.Comment: 地区等级 分省市县区

column.name: spec_key
column.Comment: 商品规格key 对应t_spec_goods_price 表

column.name: config
column.Comment: 配置首重续重等...序列化存储

column.name: status
column.Comment: 查看状态：0未查看，1已查看

column.name: oauth
column.Comment: 第三方来源 wx weibo alipay

column.name: is_distribut
column.Comment: 是否为分销商 0 否 1 是

column.name: bank_name
column.Comment: 银行名称 如支付宝 微信 中国银行 农业银行等

column.name: account_name
column.Comment: 银行账户名 可以是支付宝可以其他银行

column.name: status
column.Comment: 提现状态0申请中1申请成功2申请失败

column.name: wait_access
column.Comment: 微信接入状态,0待接入1已接入
